label: logicC:sports_en
steps: [1] If the team wins the divisional final, then it qualifies for the conference championship.
[2] If a team qualifies for the conference championship, then it is eligible for the league final.
[3] If the team is eligible for the league final and the league has cleared the venue, then the league final is scheduled for the team.
[4] The league has cleared the venue.
[5] The team won the divisional final.
[6] For every player, meeting the training workload benchmark grants clearance for match selection.
[7] Jordan met the training workload benchmark.
[8] For every player, if cleared for match selection, that player will either start or be listed on the bench.
[9] Therefore the team qualifies for the conference championship.
[10] Therefore the team is eligible for the league final.
[11] Therefore the league final is scheduled for the team.
[12] Therefore Jordan is cleared for match selection and will either start or be on the bench.
